para.text: It is Board policy to encourage the voluntary efforts of the parties to settle or adjust disputes.

Such efforts at resolution and any settlements or adjustments reached shall be consistent with the provisions, purposes, and policies of Education Article, Titles 6 and 16, Personnel and Pensions Article, Title 3, and State Government Article, Title 22, Annotated Code of Maryland.
